channel.title: Establishing Connection Timer
channel.description:
How do I change the time needed for a client to start reestablishing a connection?
Also, could mods please lock my thread that I posted in the wrong forum: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,356234.0.html
Thanks
